    • Method Detail

      • getToken

        public java.lang.String getToken(java.lang.String email,
                                 java.lang.String pwd,
                                 int userType)
                          throws AuthenticationException,
                                 com.nimbusds.jose.JOSEException
        Logs in user and retrieves access token
        Parameters:
        email - email of user
        pwd - user's password
        userType - type of leader (e.g. Scout, Leader, etc.)
        Returns:
        Serialized Json Access Token
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - thrown if login info is not valid
        com.nimbusds.jose.JOSEException - thrown if error in creating token

      • authenticateScout

        public int authenticateScout(java.lang.String tokenString)
                      throws AuthenticationException,
                             com.nimbusds.jose.JOSEException
        Authenticates scout JWT
        Parameters:
        tokenString - the serialized JWT
        Returns:
        id of the scout
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - thrown if authentication fails
        com.nimbusds.jose.JOSEException - thrown if encryption fails

        troopID - the id of the troop
        Returns:
        id of the Leader
        Throws:
